thread.title: Britney Spears Works Her Onstage Wardrobe Malfunction Like a Boss (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Works Her Onstage Wardrobe Malfunction Like a Boss (VIDEO)

title: Britney Spears Works Her Onstage Wardrobe Malfunction Like a Boss (VIDEO)
text:
0 
Work B**ch! Britney Spears suffered a wardrobe malfunction onstage at her Las Vegas show over the weekend, and she handled it like a total pro. The Grammy winner was performing "3" in a sheer bodysuit, when the entire back split open. 
And it didn't slow her down one iota. She continued to work her dance moves onstage, even as two of her backup dancers tried (unsuccessfully) to fix her costume. Although nothing sensitive got exposed, who knows what could have busted out with the entire back of her outfit ripped open? 

Brit Brit is enjoying a hugely successful residency at Planet Hollywood, which was recently extended for another two years. And she obviously deserves it -- it takes no small amount of talent to pull off this kind of wardrobe malfunction without so much as blinking! 
And when she's not accidentally busting out of her clothes onstage, the "Toxic" singer is probably busy moving into her gorgeous new multi-million dollar house in Los Angeles . 
You have to work hard to play hard, right?
